task.title: Create a Backup File
task.shortdesc: You can create a backup file of the PBX settings on the PBX web interface.

context.note: The backup file do not contain auto recording files, one-touch recording files, and voicemail files.

ul.li: For PBX version before 81.5.0.7, you can not back up one-touch recording files and voicemail files.
For PBX version 81.5.0.7 or later, you can back up one-touch recording files and voicemail files.

step.cmd: Go to Maintenance Backup and Restore , click Backup.

step.info: The default file name contains the PBX model, firmware version, and backup date.

step.cmd: In the Memo field, enter notes for the backup file.
Select where to store the backup file.
Select which configurations and files to back up.

step.stepresult: The created backup file will appear on the Backup and Restore page.
